amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce from 11 to 10 the statutory requirement for the number of operational carriers that the U.S. Navy must have.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 113-108 to reduce from 11 to 10 the statutory requirement for the number of operational carriers that the U.S. Navy must have.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 106 - 318 (Roll no. 222).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 106 - 318 (Roll no. 222).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Blumenauer.
